data.title: Get ScotRail Times & Cheap Tickets
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Singer to Whitecraigs in 1hÂ 4m. Compare prices, view live journey times & book cheap train tickets for Singer to Whitecraigs.
data.text:
Thinking about taking the train from Singer to Whitecraigs? We've got you covered.

It usually takes around 1 hour 8 minutes to travel the 9 miles (14 km) from Singer to Whitecraigs by train, although you can get there in as little as 1 hour 4 minutes on the fastest services. You'll normally find around 0 trains per day running on this route. You'll need to make 1 change along the way as there aren't any direct services on this line. As the main train operator on this route, you'll probably be travelling with ScotRail for all or at least part of your journey to Whitecraigs.

Book train tickets from Singer to Whitecraigs in advance instead of buying them on the day and you'll snap up the cheapest fares. We'll always highlight the cheapest prices in our Journey Planner, for example when you travel at Off-Peak times or use a Railcard.

If you're feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Whitecraigs by train, or check our timetable above to view live train times.
